A comprehensive digital platform empowering Students, Staff, Faculty, and Stakeholders to submit, track, and resolve grievances efficiently with transparency and accountability

Key Features

Everything you need for efficient grievance management

New

Submit Grievances

Easily submit your grievances with detailed descriptions, categories, priority levels, and file attachments

Track Status

Track the status of your submitted grievances in real-time with detailed updates and progress tracking

Communication

Communicate with administrators through comments, status updates, and direct messaging

Secure & Private

Your grievances are handled securely and confidentially with proper authentication and encryption

Email Notifications

Receive instant email notifications for grievance updates, status changes, and important announcements

Analytics & Reports

Access comprehensive reports, analytics, and insights for effective grievance management and resolution

How It Works

Simple steps to get your grievance resolved

01

Register & Login

Create your account or sign in to access the grievance portal

02

Submit Grievance

Fill out the grievance form with all necessary details and attachments

03

Track Progress

Monitor your grievance status and receive updates in real-time

04

Get Resolved

Receive resolution updates and feedback from administrators
